publication.title: Systems Limitations Hamper Integration of Accessible Information Technology in Northwest U.S. K-12 Schools
publication.authors: jennifer p. wisdom,nathan white,kimberley goldsmith,sarann bielavitz,amy rees
publication.abstract: Although federal U.S. regulations require schools to provide equal access to educational opportunities for all students, many technologies used in K-12 schools present accessibility barriers for students with disabilities.
